summary: in vitro bactericidal and virucidal efficacy of povidone-iodine (PVP-I) 7% gargle/mouthwash was tested against Klebsiella pneumoniae and Streptococcus pneumoniae. results showed effective bactericidal and virucidal activity, respectively, per european standards. wash showed rapid bactericidal activity and virucidal efficacy in vitro at a concentration of 0.23% PVP-I. may provide a protective oropharyngeal hygiene measure for individuals at high risk of exposure to oral and respiratory pathogens.
